text: avanu nim'mannu ottu serisuva dina, antima samavesada a dinavu, bhari nastada dinavagiruvudu. Allahanu, tannalli visvasavittu satkarma madidavana ella papagalannu nivarisuvanu mattu avanannu, tala bhagadalli nadigalu hariyuttiruva svargadolage serisuvanu. Avaru alli sadakala iruvaru. Idu nijakku maha saubhagyavagide
